name: Mouse Escape (itch) (felipesoares11)
description:
(|)======Mouse Escape======(|)

_______ |             |          |           |               |_________

Move your mouse around the screen to escape the red things!
Play with friends!
Have a wave to decorate your mouse!
And more coming soon!
(Warning the mouse on the screenshots it's fake you use your pc normal mouse!)

(ONLY ON PC) 

(NEEDS MOUSE)

(NEEDS git gud)
